Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Pattern
Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

About Us:

Tevxj creates premium party products that love life and have fun.

Our mission: Vivid design, fun elements, to provide customers with chic party kits to make your party more exciting and impressive!

Core Values: Passionate and Focused, Courageous to Innovate, Work Together, and Improve Quality

back to school

By Tevxj

Have a great party time! !

Package Include:You will get 8pcs glow in the dark large cartoons Xmas yard signs,16 plastic stakes and 4 pieces of 2m string light.Large size and large quantity will give you a extra-value meal.
Premium Quality:Made of plastic cardboard, light and durable, waterproof and weatherproof. High quality printing technology will not fade easily.These Christmas yard sign with light are very suitalbe for outdoor, and can be reused for many years.
Easy to use:These Christmas yard decorations has Simple Assembly Required.The package will give you 8 pieces of large sign and 16 plastic poles. You only need to insert two poles into the North Pole sign and press them into the ground. The package also comes with 4 pieces of 2m string light and 40 stickers. You can stick these string lights on signs to make them glow in the dark.
Unique Design:Unlike other products, the design of these Christmas yard signs are more interesting and vivid. Sticking them in the ground will create the effect of coming out of the ground.It will be a unique decoration for Christmas.
Christmas Decorations:These Christmas yard signs are specific and rich in Christmas elements. Decorating them in your yard will attract the attention of neighbors and passers-by and make your Christmas memorable.

item.title: FLOCK THREE Hanging Car Trash Bag Foldable Fun Sturdy Trash Container Storage Waterproof Car Trash Bin with Velkro Cute Grocery Organizer Bag for Automotive Front Seat Headrest Trash Can (Dog Family)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)



WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.
HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick the tape fastener bars together. Fold the edge at least 4 times up and snap the buttons together. It can be adjusted to 3 different sizes to suit your needs.
DRAWSTRING TOP AND TAPE FASTENER BOTTOM: The top drawstring is made from nylon rope. You can easily adjust the opening size of the bag with the drawstring to dispose the garbage. The bottom of this bag is stitched left and right with two pieces of tape fastener bars. The tape fastener bottom makes emptying a breeze. Easy to clean and empty.
SNAP BUTTON STRAP: This car trash bag has a handle strap on top of the holder for you to hang them anywhere you like! There are two snap buttons on the strap. The strap is adjustable and allows you to hang it up or take it down hassle-free. The sturdy handle can be easily hung on car seat, armrest, headrest or anywhere inside your car or any other places that you deem fit.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BAG: This car trash bag is the perfect solution to keep and organise your used plastic grocery bags. It also could also be used to store undergarments, socks, baby washcloths and bibs. It is the best solution for space saving. You can hang it anywhere in the kitchen, bedroom, storeroom or workshop.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}

submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,

Motor Trend Waterproof Car Seat Covers for Front Seats – Padded Neoprene with Two-Tone Stitching, Easy to Install Automotive Seat Covers, Universal Fit for Cars Trucks Vans and SUVs, Gray Stitching. Universal fit design for pick-up trucks, hatchback sedans and most other types of car, truck, van & SUV. Also works great as a baby, pet, or dog seat cover. Perfect car accessories for rideshare drivers too!
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior. Bucket seats dimensions-Back Height-2 feet. Width-1 feet 9 inch. Bottom Length(fr. the back)-1 feet 6 inch Width-1 feet 10 inch
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.



Motor Trend SpillGuard Waterproof Car Seat Covers

Front Seats Only

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.

Modern Design

Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Breathable materials for maximum comfort during your commute.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam lining repels water and other liquids.
  • Universal Fit for Most Vehicles.
  • Easy to Install.

Read more




Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

Made for Auto Enthusiasts

Motor Trend offers only high-quality premium products designed to protect and enhance your car or truck.

FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vans’ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seats’ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, that’s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. It’s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Description

Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

Look No Further For Your Keys！

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Look No Further For Your Keys

Adds CONVENIENCE & SPACE for your keys, cards, money, charger, phone, and cosmetics，receipts. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Intimate Settings

These car gap filler organizers can make it easier for you to find the ‘car items’ you need on the road. The precise fit of the design transforms the organizer into several high boxes with storage compartments. Make your Armrest console organized and looks much cleaner.

Easy To Install

These car seat gap fillers with cup holders can be easily washed with water. Besides, the installation is relatively simple, no tools required, installation car seat gap filler just inserts the between car seat gap filler and console, Can find a suitable position.

Specification:

Product Color: Black Main Material: Flocking materials, PU Leather, and ABS Plastic Suitable: Not was suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.6 inches(1.5 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Package size (L*W*H): 11.22in x 6.92in x 4.17in Product Weight: 1.91lb Package Content: 1 x Left Storage box 1 x Right Storage box 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth 2 x Car Back Seat Headrest Hooks

Say Goodbye to Mess – If you have problems on losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat gap filler is for you. It prevents small items from falling between the car seat gap, gives you a place to put change, pens, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach.
New Version Car Seat Gap Filler – This car seat organizer has a good texture that feels like a baby’s skin that is fine and smooth. The car storage organizer front seat is made of high-quality black ABS plastic and PU leather that cannot break, slip, bend or leave any scratches. With a velvet material pads that can prevent items from sliding and rattling.
Fashion Design and Driving Safety – This front seat gap filler will help you create a neat and clean environment. This seat gap filler fits the car seat gaps. Because it will not shake when you brake suddenly, and it is not too big to waste your car seat space. The new design added red stitching which adds to the overall appearance. Make your car more outstanding among friends.
Perfect Size Car Storage Organizer- Not suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.78 inches(2 cm) and central console lower than the seat. The size of the car seat gap organizer is 10.23 x 6.49 x 2.95 inches which is suitable for most vehicles. The cup holder can fit cups up to 2.75 inches in diameter. Just like the size of aluminum Coca-Cola. Please measure the distance between your seat and the console carefully before you purchase.
Excellent Service – 2 car seat back hooks and 1 microfiber cleaning cloth as the gift. We provide one year of free replacement of this car seat gap filler with cup holder and 6 months of quality assurance. Please rest assured to buy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, please email us directly, we promise to provide every customer with quality products and services.

The newest from Motor Trend: 3 layer waterproof car seat covers feature a soft polyester cloth outer layer with waterproof neoprene backing. Behind these layers is a patented non-slip backing which both reinforces and prevents tearing, while also keeping the cover in place and preventing slippage.
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.
